column1: Little Goat Diner////I love Stephanie and I love Top Chef but my sammich left much to be desired. I got the Los Drowned and thought it would be made with braised beef but it wasn't. It was difficult to eat and the big hunks of beef
column3: weren't very flavorful. My friend got the fish tostadas and they were delicious. So maybe I just made a bad choice. When I go to visit my friends again
column4: I'll give it a second chance and order something else. The decor is gorgeous and it's bright and airy.
